name: toolbar(_:itemForItemIdentifier:willBeInsertedIntoToolbar:)
desc: Sent to request a new toolbar item; returns a toolbar item of the identified kind for the specified toolbar.
declaration:
optional func toolbar(_ toolbar: NSToolbar, 
itemForItemIdentifier itemIdentifier: NSToolbarItem.Identifier, 
willBeInsertedIntoToolbar flag: Bool) -> NSToolbarItem?
